articles.author: Radifah Kabir
articles.title: World Stroke Day: Paralysis, Aphasia, Vision Problems — Physical Symptoms That May Arise After Stroke, And Why - ABP Live
articles.description: A stroke or a brain attack occurs when blood supply to a part of the brain is blocked, or when a blood vessel in the brain bursts, as a result of which parts of the brain become damaged or die.
